conversations.body_text: Hi Jorge Acedo,      We apologize for the delay. Your package is expected to arrive around the 15th.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326631705DE

No problem, thank you for the update.

El mié, 12 nov 2025 a las 11:52, service@simsonn.com (
